ChunkText: change of status considerations: please note, you can not travel outside the US while your h-1b application is pending through a change of status, or even after it is approved, before it becomes active on october 1. the next time you travel abroad after oct 1, you will need to apply for an h-1b visa stamp in your passport in order to return to the us.
ContextBefore: consular processing means the change to h-1b will only take place after the h-1b is approved and the person leaves the us, applies for an h-1b visa, and returns to the US with the h-1b visa.
ContextAfter: as with any visa type, you can only apply for the new visa while you are outside the us. consular processing considerations: if you are changing via consular processing, you would need to wait until after october 1, and at some point after that date leave the US and apply for an h-1b visa.
